alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:27AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lake and Volusia Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1226 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Ormond-By-the-Sea to 11 miles southwest of Santos. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange, Ormond Beach and DeLand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
